Again in the year 577 of the Armenian era there came the Persian aspasalar, the emir who was called Zangi the son of Aqsunqur, the man who previously held the city of Aleppo.the man who had previously ruled Ganjak, which David the Georgian king destroyed and caused him to flee to Persia.and his brother Melik was seated on his throne,In this same year the Persian sultan Mahmud son of Tapâ€˜ar died,And he established as mediator Joscelin, and having stayed a few days he went with his whole army to Damascus, for the emir of Damascus, called Tughtikin, had died, and his son held the city.And he sought to create amity and peace with the great Frankish count Bohemond, the lord of Antioch.He came and descended with an army on the environs of Edessa, and established amity with the Frankish count Joscelin and harmlessly went back to Aleppo.
